    • Method Detail

      • findViewById

        public static <T extends View> T findViewById(Activity context,
                              int id)
        Purpose - Find the view with explicit type checking.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context of an activity from where the method is called.
        id - Id generated for the field whose view is to be found.
        Returns:
        view if found and null if view is not found.

      • removeKeyboard

        public static void removeKeyboard(Context context,
                  View view,
                  int flags)
        Purpose - Hide the keyboard from the current view that holds the focus.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Activity Context this method is called from.
        view - Current view that holds keyboard focus
        flags - Additional operational flags for hiding soft input from window.

      • showKeyboard

        public static void showKeyboard(Context context,
                View field)
        Purpose - Show the soft keyboard focused on a field.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity/Context
        field - field that requests focus

      • setVisible

        public static void setVisible(Activity context,
              int id,
              boolean visible)
        Purpose - Make a view visible\invisible for an activity.
        Parameters:
        context - Current Activity context
        id - Resource id for the view
        visible - If true, would make the view visible, else will hide it.
